amendment.description: An amendment numbered 28 printed in Part B of House Report 115-711 to provide funding to expedite the work of the Department of Energy's Defense-Related Uranium Mines Program's work on Native American Reservations in the west.

vote.text: On agreeing to the O'Halleran amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. O'Halleran.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the O'Halleran amendment (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
